ProteinName	RNA-binding motif protein, Y chromosome, family 1 member A1 (RNA-binding motif protein 1) (RNA-binding motif protein 2) (Y chromosome RNA recognition motif 1) (hRBMY)
GeneName	RBMY1A1 RBM1 RBM2 YRRM1 YRRM2
Length	459
Function	RNA-binding protein involved in pre-mRNA splicing. Required for sperm development. Acts additively with TRA2B to promote exon 7 inclusion of the survival motor neuron SMN. Binds non-specifically to mRNAs.
